name: vern-authentication
description: Basic username/password authentication for vern. Also provides a basic user model and extends the BaseController and BaseModel for utilization
readme:

# VERN Authentication

Handles basic user/password authentication routines

## New VERN Controllers

* AuthController

### BaseController Extensions

* checkAuth
* requiresAuth
* isAuthenticated

## New VERN Models

* UserModel

### BaseModel Extensions

* getByOwner
* getByIdAndOwner
* addOwner
* requiresOwner
